TABLE.NAME: tool_lpsync
TABLE.COMMENT: General database configuration and mapping of required headers to external database headers.

FIELD.NAME: parentidnumber
FIELD.COMMENT: Competencies are arranged in a tree. This field indicates which competency is the parent of the current row.

FIELD.NAME: idnumber
FIELD.COMMENT: A string that uniquely identifies this competency in this framework

FIELD.NAME: shortname
FIELD.COMMENT: A short name for the competency

FIELD.NAME: description
FIELD.COMMENT: A longer description for the competency

FIELD.NAME: descriptionformat
FIELD.COMMENT: A number representing the format of the text in the description. Valid options are: 0 = Moodle format, 1 = HTML, 2 = Plain text, 3 = Wiki format, 4 = Markdown

FIELD.NAME: scalevalues
FIELD.COMMENT: Only required on the framework row. Defines a comma separated list of options used to grade the competencies

FIELD.NAME: scaleconfiguration
FIELD.COMMENT: A json encoded object used to define the scale configuration.

FIELD.NAME: relatedidnumbers
FIELD.COMMENT: A comma separated list of id numbers belonging to competencies related to the current row

FIELD.NAME: isframework
FIELD.COMMENT: Must be 1 for a single row in the framework which defines the name and description of the entire framework

FIELD.NAME: taxonomy
FIELD.COMMENT: Defined for the framework row, defines the lang string keys used to describe competencies at each level of the framework
